questions.question: Put > or <
questions.explanation: For most values of x < 3, B (2x+5) is greater than A (3x+2), so A < B.

questions.svg_content: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 300 150' width='100%' style='max-width: 500px; display: block; margin: auto;'><rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='#FFE6EE' /><line x1='150' y1='0' x2='150' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' /><!-- Left side tomatoes (4) --><circle cx='50' cy='40' r='20' fill='#FF6347' stroke='#CC0000' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='100' cy='40' r='20' fill='#FF6347' stroke='#CC0000' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='50' cy='90' r='20' fill='#FF6347' stroke='#CC0000' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='100' cy='90' r='20' fill='#FF6347' stroke='#CC0000' stroke-width='2'/><!-- Right side tomatoes (2) --><circle cx='200' cy='60' r='20' fill='#FF6347' stroke='#CC0000' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='250' cy='90' r='20' fill='#FF6347' stroke='#CC0000' stroke-width='2'/><!-- Tomato stems --><line x1='50' y1='20' x2='50' y2='30' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='100' y1='20' x2='100' y2='30' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='50' y1='70' x2='50' y2='80' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='100' y1='70' x2='100' y2='80' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='200' y1='40' x2='200' y2='50' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='3'/><line x1='250' y1='70' x2='250' y2='80' stroke='#228B22' stroke-width='3'/></svg>

questions.question: Tick which are more in number.
questions.svg_content: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 300 150' width='100%' style='max-width: 500px; display: block; margin: auto;'><rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='#FFFFE0' /><line x1='150' y1='0' x2='150' y2='150' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' /><!-- Left side fish (3) --><path d='M30,50 Q50,30 70,50 Q50,70 30,50' fill='#FFD700' stroke='#B8860B' stroke-width='1.5'/><path d='M30,90 Q50,70 70,90 Q50,110 30,90' fill='#FFD700' stroke='#B8860B' stroke-width='1.5'/><path d='M30,130 Q50,110 70,130 Q50,150 30,130' fill='#FFD700' stroke='#B8860B' stroke-width='1.5'/><!-- Right side fish (4) --><path d='M180,40 Q200,20 220,40 Q200,60 180,40' fill='#FFD700' stroke='#B8860B' stroke-width='1.5'/><path d='M180,80 Q200,60 220,80 Q200,100 180,80' fill='#FFD700' stroke='#B8860B' stroke-width='1.5'/><path d='M180,120 Q200,100 220,120 Q200,140 180,120' fill='#FFD700' stroke='#B8860B' stroke-width='1.5'/><path d='M230,60 Q250,40 270,60 Q250,80 230,60' fill='#FFD700' stroke='#B8860B' stroke-width='1.5'/><!-- Fish tails and eyes --><polygon points='70,50 90,40 90,60' fill='#B8860B'/><circle cx='40' cy='50' r='2' fill='white'/><polygon points='70,90 90,80 90,100' fill='#B8860B'/><circle cx='40' cy='90' r='2' fill='white'/><polygon points='70,130 90,120 90,140' fill='#B8860B'/><circle cx='40' cy='130' r='2' fill='white'/><polygon points='220,40 240,30 240,50' fill='#B8860B'/><circle cx='190' cy='40' r='2' fill='white'/><polygon points='220,80 240,70 240,90' fill='#B8860B'/><circle cx='190' cy='80' r='2' fill='white'/><polygon points='220,120 240,110 240,130' fill='#B8860B'/><circle cx='190' cy='120' r='2' fill='white'/><polygon points='270,60 290,50 290,70' fill='#B8860B'/><circle cx='240' cy='60' r='2' fill='white'/></svg>

questions.question: Tick which are less in number.
questions.svg_content: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 300 200' width='100%' style='max-width: 500px; display: block; margin: auto;'><rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='#FFF5E6' /><line x1='0' y1='100' x2='300' y2='100' stroke='#FF6B6B' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='8,4'/><!-- Top section hats (3) --><path d='M50,40 L70,80 L30,80 Z' fill='#FF5252' stroke='#D32F2F' stroke-width='1.5'/><circle cx='50' cy='40' r='5' fill='#FFEB3B' stroke='#FBC02D' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M150,30 L170,70 L130,70 Z' fill='#FF5252' stroke='#D32F2F' stroke-width='1.5'/><circle cx='150' cy='30' r='5' fill='#FFEB3B' stroke='#FBC02D' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M250,50 L270,90 L230,90 Z' fill='#FF5252' stroke='#D32F2F' stroke-width='1.5'/><circle cx='250' cy='50' r='5' fill='#FFEB3B' stroke='#FBC02D' stroke-width='1'/><!-- Bottom section hats (2) --><path d='M100,130 L120,170 L80,170 Z' fill='#FF5252' stroke='#D32F2F' stroke-width='1.5'/><circle cx='100' cy='130' r='5' fill='#FFEB3B' stroke='#FBC02D' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M200,120 L220,160 L180,160 Z' fill='#FF5252' stroke='#D32F2F' stroke-width='1.5'/><circle cx='200' cy='120' r='5' fill='#FFEB3B' stroke='#FBC02D' stroke-width='1'/><!-- Hat decorations --><circle cx='35' cy='65' r='2' fill='white'/><circle cx='65' cy='65' r='2' fill='white'/><circle cx='135' cy='55' r='2' fill='white'/><circle cx='165' cy='55' r='2' fill='white'/><circle cx='235' cy='75' r='2' fill='white'/><circle cx='265' cy='75' r='2' fill='white'/><circle cx='85' cy='155' r='2' fill='white'/><circle cx='115' cy='155' r='2' fill='white'/><circle cx='185' cy='145' r='2' fill='white'/><circle cx='215' cy='145' r='2' fill='white'/></svg>

feedback.correct: That's right! The top has 3 party hats!
feedback.incorrect: Look again! The top section has more hats.
